Reviews.Title: About that base . . .
Reviews.Author: Christopher Grant
Reviews.Content: Putting together the base was fairly straightforward for me.  At no point did I feel that I had to overtighten the screws in order to keep things from wobbling.  The one glitch is that (in English, French, and Spanish) the instructions for assembling the base have the labels for the front and the rear switched, so that the pedestal is alleged to be closer to the front of the base than the rear, contrary to what published photos of the assembled product indicate.  I don't know if this mislabeling is what has given people problems with the base, or if Samsung used to ship worse-fitting hardware than it does now.  In any case, I'm glad I didn't let the complaints about the base hold me back from purchasing this item.I've owned this set for less than 24 hours, but perhaps some initial impressions will be helpful to other shoppers:1)  I spent over half an hour wandering through an electronics megastore comparing pictures and I have to say that I couldn't detect any advantage of 1080p over 720p for sets of this size.  (I assume that a store this big was feeding in some 1080p content, but I could be wrong.)  At home, over-the-air 720p and 1080i content looks great on this set.2)  While the LED sets are sleeker than the LCD sets, I didn't think that the LED picture was any better.  Both I and one other customer in the store were vacillating between the Samsung UN32D4000N and this set, and we both ended up opting for this one.3)  Some review sites represent these LCD sets as having narrow viewing angles.  To my eyes, that was far from true, as almost every set in the store had a picture that was easily viewable from far to the side.4)  Buyers' guides imply that we all now need sets that are twice as big as the sets we were buying a few years ago.  In particular, a 32-inch set is all of a sudden considered far too small for a living room.  Well, I think this set looks good in my living room.  It's nice not to have my house look like my life revolves around television viewing.5)  If there's a way to have this set memorize channels from two different antenna positions, it wasn't obvious to me.  Fortunately, on my 3rd or 4th try I was able to orient my antenna so that the set located all my local channels on one scan.6)  At this set's current price, you run very little risk of buyers' remorse.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality, mediocre audio at best
Reviews.Author: J. Hetherington
Reviews.Content: Cons:1) As noted in other reviews attaching the stand to the television is challenging and will require much more force than you would believe necessary.2) Owners manual is not very thorough nor are instructions very clear3) Attaching the securing strap(not included) on the back of the televsion to your stand involves creativity & parts of your choosing, as there are no instruction.Pros:1) Excellent video quality for 720P/60Hz2) Attractive / aesthetically pleasing appearance3) Nice menu layout and features4) (2)HDMI's & (1)USBFor anyone experiencing problems with the picture quality this television has a built in picture & audio test. To implement the test(s) you will needto press;  1)The Green Menu Button near the center of the remote  2)Use the UP arrow to scroll UP one to where "Support" is displayed vertically along the left edge of the set  3)Arrow to the RIGHT Once  4)Arrow DOWN once to "Self Diagnosis"  5)Press Enter or the button in the middle of the four arrow keys  6)Select Either "Picture Test" or "Sound Test"  The picture test displays two children on a beach surrounded by some beach toys, it displays very vibrant colors, blues, oranges, yellow as well as strong sunlight contrast  to check the black and white balance of the set. My test image appears incredible.  The sound test plays some type of theme song music that I personally find annoying yet it also provides very clear, stereo sound and does so at the volume level your set is  set to at the time of the test.Unfortunately because the owners manual is so lacking it takes time to learn all the settings and adjust them appropriately. Yet once you have the picture quality of this televisionrivals any 32" television I have ever seen, bar none.

Reviews.Title: Another great Samsung.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Coming from an LNT4061, LNT4069, and, most recently, an LN40A650, I'd happy to say that this TV has yet to disappoint. The Samsung quality is all there and it feels considerably evolved from the previous generations I've owned. I'm using this as an office monitor and television - for both occasions, it's a terrific set. The colors are vivid, the sound is crisp, and I have yet to experience any issues with it. I'd also note that this television, while considered the entry level for 2011, is slightly thinner and substantially lighter than other 32" models within the Samsung product lineup and other companies' models within the same price range. There ARE thinner and lighter 32" TV's, but you'll spend an additional $150+ just for the size difference. This was a deciding factor in my case, since I wanted an easily wall-mounted TV without breaking the bank. I'd highly recommend this particular model for anyone looking for a bedroom/office television. It's just the right quality and size at just the right price.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Average Sound, Awesome Price!
Reviews.Author: Charles "TwiZtidz"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN26D450 26" LCD tv has been great.  The picture is remarkable. There is minimal ghosting during fast action video, the colors are full and vibrant. Much better than older 26" LCD tv's I've looked at in the past.  The Price of the new 2011 models are much better than last year models as well (~$100 cheaper).  The menus are very easy to use in making adjustments.  The remote is also very easy to use.  It has all the necessary Component and HDMI slots for setting up Directv/Cable box, Blu Ray players, and more.  It has it all!!The only aspect of this tv that is not perfect is the sound quality.  I have yet to see a LCD tv with good sound.  I have a 52" LCD tv in the living room and it was awful.  I had to get a Bose system to finally get some good sound.  This 26" tv is better than other tv's sound quality I have heard, but its still not perfect.  I use this for my bedroom, so the sound is perfectly sufficient for my needs. No matter what lcd tv you buy nowadays, your pretty much forced to buy an audio system to along with it.  Overall, this tv is great and I would buy it again if I had to.  When looking at the other 26" tv options out there, this tv exceeds expectations!

Reviews.Title: Nice set
Reviews.Author: Krunk
Reviews.Content: Solid looking TV with wide, stable stand. Picture is great, but then most of the new sets look great as long as you're watching HD. For anyone who's still unaware, a standard resolution picture will actually look worse on your new HDTV than it did on you're old 4:3 tube set---just not enough signal information. I'm continually reading user reviews of flat panel TV's that knock the sound quality. Don't know what they're expectations are. I'm sure there are some tinny sounding sets out there, but I've had no problems with 3 name-brand TV's (LG, Sony, and this Samsung). And the sound on this model seems particularly good. Try out the different Sound Modes and make sure the SRS TruSound HD is turned ON, to get the stereo effect. There's even an equalizer. All the inputs you're likely to need. My one nitpicky criticism (which will not be a problem for most) is that the 2nd HDMI input is located on the side. I connected my DVD player there, and because of the height of an HDMI plug, the cable actually shows beyond the side of the bezel when viewing the set from the front (which is of course where you will be). I believe most people will find this to be a very satisfactory purchase---perfect size for a bedroom or small den.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: gerrycee
Reviews.Content: The USB port is a great feature. You can put 2 movies on a 2gb memory module. So far it plays every movie format I have tried. Amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great Value but Beware Power Bridge Users - Requires the UltraSlim
Reviews.Author: Curt M "Curlee"
Reviews.Content: If you are using PowerBridge to hide cables, this requires the "Ultra Slim" version, even though this TV is not an ultra slim TV. It appears that Samsung has started using the flat plugs on more than just the LED ultra slim TVs.Otherwise, this is a great TV for the price. I selected this size for use as a bedroom TV. The plug and play setup made it a snap to set up and configure everything and recognize all the channels. My favorite features are the USB port and the On/Off timer. I can use a USB flash drive and play popular PC movie formats (verified) including: AVI, WMV, MOV, MP4, among others. The interface to select, play media from USB is easy to use just like you were playing a DVD.The On/Off timer is standard on all Samsung TVs. Great to use as an alarm clock.Ordered this with Super Saver Shipping, and yet it was still delivered in only 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn
Reviews.Content: I needed a TV for my bedroom, and this is perfect!!!  I did a lot of research as to which brand to buy, and Samsung was a top choice.  I actually purchased three Samsungs at the same time for three different rooms, and love all of them!!!  All were extremely easy to attach the base to, set up, and light enough for me to carry each by myself.  Great choice!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: N. Hustis "SsikNick"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV fairly recently and it's fantastic. The picture quality is amazing. The audio quality is good especially compared to other LCD TV's. It's somewhat thin but clear. The design of the TV is very nice and classy. Has all the connections that you'll need for whatever device(s) you want to hook up.Great value. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 LCD with cool USB connection
Reviews.Author: Simsio1 "hse7"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV last week and this is my initial assessment.Nice picture quality, design, sound not bad out of the box, good size for a bedroom, only 2 HDMI's and the features I Like the most is that I can play my Movies through the USB connection including avi's, no need to get a Blue ray with USB that can do that. The other feature is that is only connected to cable (Optimum online) with out a cable box and it gets a bunch of channel and many of them in HDTV.The remote control itself is not bad better than some that I own but it can be better. I would like that the main buttons glow in the dark in fact not just for this remote but my other one's too.I initially encountered the issue mention in the other reviews with installing the screws in the stand's mount, I switched to the other set (There are two sets of 4 screws) they never got 100% down but down enough to be stable and that seems to fixed the problem.Pros:Picture qualitySoundUSB (Play's movies)Channels availability with out an actual cable boxCons:Remote control can be better.Only 2 HDMI's.Stand installation.

Reviews.Title: Much better than the previous flat panel
Reviews.Author: AEinstein
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an LG flat panel.The previous TV sound was terrible.  This TV has a MUCH BETTER picture and the SOUND is far better than the old one.The remote and controls are intuitive.The clarity of the display is excellent.I have a large screen SAMSUNG also.  I will never again buy anything else but SAMSUNG.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful HDTV
Reviews.Author: gstpal
Reviews.Content: TV has beautiful picture - very good blacks, very good definition. Sound quality is excellent compared to others in the same size/price.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: indio-70 "AAN"
Reviews.Content: This TV is portable and has lots of features, It is great for the bedroom or office, has a nice clear picture and the internal speakers have good sound you might have to go to the menu and change the sound setting but then you will be fine. And the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Jung Hyun Lee
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN32D450 is great!Sound: The sound is great overall and has options such as standard, movie, clear voice, music, and amplify. Some people recommend movie as the default setting but I like the sound of standard better. Even at volume 12 (out of 50 max?) the sound is loud enough for me.Picture Quality: The display is very clear and crisp. Honestly for 32 inch TV, don't see a difference between 1080p and 720p.Stand: I had no problem assembling the stand, and it is very stable. You just need a driver to put it together. Took me about 5 minutes to assemble the stand and I am generally pretty slow at assembling things.Other features: Has a USB connection which plays movie files from your thumb drive/external hard drive. Very convenient feature.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: We needed a small TV for a second living area.  We did not want to hook up external speakers so we needed one with good audio.  All I can say is the picture is excellent and the audio is very good.This is a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for nursing home
Reviews.Author: JUDY
Reviews.Content: My brothers and I purchased this tv for our mom in the nursing home.  She absolutely loved it.  The perfect picture bursting with beautiful colors amazed her.  Everyone that comes into the room says how nice it is.  The size of the tv is perfect since the room is small and she sits close to the set.  It takes up less room on the dresser than her other one did.  Everyone is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Really fantastic tv set!
Reviews.Author: Vivian "Vivi"
Reviews.Content: I purchased an LN32D450G1 from Bestbuy by chance that it was on sale. I wasn't looking for it specifically it just became my decision after spending 30 minutes in the store judging all the HDTV's comparatively. The Samsung was my choice as the Sony 32inch Bravia I was planning to get was out of stock. This set is centered in my living room and it looks great. It fits in so well almost like a furniture piece with the the plexiglass covering Samsung put around the edges. Assembling the T.V. only took about 10 minutes as I spent about 6 of them just looking for a screw driver. After that everything is plug and play.The T.V. has lots of options for viewing and you can customize it really to suit what ever you like. There's more than enough features for me. It sounds perfect and I wasn't expecting that from an HDTV. I thought the sound quality would suffer because it's a flat panel but it really does sound just fine. With the features of the set I feel like I really got a deal with the Samsung. DVD's look decent as well. I only have the RCA DVD input for now so I can't be too judging. I never owned a Samsung before as I've always used Magnavox sets but they aren't what they used to be. So far I'm happy and hope to get good service out the T.V. if not that's what the 4year warranty I brought is for.

Reviews.Title: good small TV
Reviews.Author: trlamb
Reviews.Content: This TV works like my other Samsung TV, just smaller. I bought this TV because it would fit on my spare bedroom's book shelf. It has HDMI, USB and CATV connections, so the cable box, DVD recorder, laptop and Roku box all work with it -- and all can be plugged in at the same time. The display is full HD and the sound is decent.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LN32 D450
Reviews.Author: Dprincess
Reviews.Content: This tv is asthetically very nice, has a black glossy look and very bright colorful pic with good sound. It was easy to set up..and I'm not very good with this sort of thing. I just wish it had more component outlets, and it only has two HDMI hookups. I guess I just need to buy HDMI cables. However I did do a couple of nights of research looking for a nice 32" for under $4oo and this was the one I liked most.Looks great in my bedroom. I would definetly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My first HDTV purchase is a winner!!
Reviews.Author: Bart R. Kasper "Bartman"
Reviews.Content: After waiting many years for HDTVs to go up in quality and down in price, I did my research this past Summer and among the highest-rated HDTV sets came from Samsung. After narrowing it down to a 32" model since I live alone, I had to decide between the 720p or 1080p models.  Glad I made the choice I made, 'cause this is one of the nicest HDTVs you will find for a great price (bought mine for less than $350 total with tax).The HD reception is nothing short of amazing and the AV picture produced by progressive scan is terrific; looking forward to getting a Blu-ray player to further expand my video library!  The set can either be wall-mounted or table-top (mine is on my entertainment center) and the picture is great no matter from what angle one views.  The HD sound produced by the optional SRS feature is great when used on HD channels or DVDs with 5.1 Dolby Digital - I keep it set to "ON" for all viewing.Whether this is your first HDTV purchase or you are looking for a second set for your home, this Samsung model is a nice surpise and a great choice for the budget-conscious consumer.

Reviews.Title: Good TV!
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV for the money.  Picture quality is not quite as sharp as it could be, but overall you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good Product at Good Price
Reviews.Author: Greenpia
Reviews.Content: This is my first Samsung LCD TV.I compared features and price with Sony, LG, Sharp, Panasonic and decided on this one.It is good TV. Size is right for my bedroom. I would not recommend buying smaller than 32 inch.Screen is clear and set up was easy as well.Many buyer complained of base assembly so I took extra caution...and no problemI was little disappointed that this model did not come with swiveling base...I assume because of size.Colors are clear...I do see some unnatural movement sometimes. Not sure if it is because I watch smaller screen at close distance, or it might be limitation of 60Mhz refresh rate.Design is great...beautiful. Although thickness is quite a lot and it is somewhat heavy.Sound is just so-so...I understand its limitation but could be better.Remote control is worse than other Samsung or my Sony...It just looks cheap and unorganized.This TV has touch sensitive buttons on front. Great design and simple detail but not easy to use especially in the dark or by seniorsOne great feature! USB connection that you can play movies directly! You don't need to connect to PC! Amazing!!!With few faults and overall greatness, I give this TV, 4 stars.Recommended to other buyers and friends.

Reviews.Title: My New Samsung Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Patricia Wood
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my old bedroom TV, so I did some research and came up with Sony or Samsung.  For the money, the Samsung was by far the best buy.  I read all the reviews, most posted by men who wrote with authority, and was prepared for difficulty in setting it up, and then a less than great sound.  However, price was as important as quality, so I went with the Samsung.  I am a long-retired senior English teacher, and by myself, I had the TV up and connected within an hour.  The sound is excellent and the picture is really fine quality.  I will definitely get another Samsung when my living room Sony TV finally goes.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Tony A. Shoemaker
Reviews.Content: Samsung tends to be slightly higher in price compared to other televisions of like attributes, but with that slightly higher price comes quality and satisfaction.  For those that have many devices to connect, do note the following:HDMI:  2 (version 1.4)Component Video (Y/PB/PR):  1PC Input:  1USB 2.0 Ports:  1Component Audio Input:  1PC Audio Input:  1My wife and I are very happy with this LCD.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: dc law
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for summer house in august and for home in november.  It was easy to install for a non-technical guy and provides great depth and color

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Gyingst
Reviews.Content: After watching a little 13" TV, I finally took the plunge and bought this 22" Samsung. It was a good purchase and the price was right. Set up was a no-brainer. My next purchase will be a blu-ray disc player, so I can stream Amazon Instant Video.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Boston Chuck
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for an inexpensive TV for your kitchen or bedroom this is the one.  I installed this unit in my kitchen and I couldn't be happier. Both the picture and sound are better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: hywong89
Reviews.Content: Great tv, great sound and picture quality. I am enjoying it very much and will recommend it to others. So far no issues and has worked very well to stream movies and watch basic tv channels.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a smaller room
Reviews.Author: Jim R.
Reviews.Content: This review is about the 26" TV, not one of the larger sets which seem to be lumped together here.  We love this TV.  Right out of the box, the picture was perfect, no fiddling with color, contrast or anything else.  Deep blacks and very crisp edges.  Minimal picture fading at acute viewing angles.  It's 720p but actually seems sharper and clearer than two 1020i's that we have.  At this screen size, no need at all for more than 720p. Our HD channels on DirecTV are flawless and standard channels are very good.The sound doesn't make me jump up and applaud, but it's clear, pleasing and plenty loud enough for the bedroom where we have it.  It has audio out terminals if you want to use an external sound system.  The only difficulty I had was attaching the the base with three provided screws.  The screw holes are deliberately made smaller in order to achieve a tight fit, but I had to use an electric screwdriver to drive them all the way home, trying not to overdo it. That did the job perfectly. It also accepts a standard wall bracket. Minimal instruction manual but a more complete version is available at samsung.com.  I don't see any need for it.In short, we think the picture and clarity are outstanding, sound is fine for most people, and we're glad we paid $30 - $50 more to get this superior machine.

Reviews.Title: Great picture & sound
Reviews.Author: walterco-sd "walterco-sd"
Reviews.Content: We went from a 20 inch analog TV and converter box to a 26 inch digital TV with the Samsung LN26D450 26 LCD HDTV.  What a difference it makes in better picture quality and sound, and not just due to increased screen size. The remote is easy to use and there are lots of choices available for picture and sound.  We do not have cable - have indoor antenna - and only get a few over the air channels, but ones we get are superb.  Our set up, which included DVR and external speakers,  was a bit tricky but Samsung provides good info in its printed and e-manual, and on its Support website, including troubleshooting guides.  Don't think the external speakers are really needed - Movie choice for rear speakers is very good - but they were available so we added them.

Reviews.Title: Loving every minute!
Reviews.Author: Jay Schilken
Reviews.Content: Bought it for a small room & it is amazing! I have a 42inch Vizio which I like but this tv is much better. Picture quality is top notch. Samsung must have finally taken a hint because base was very easy to install. Got hooked up with Direct Tv whole house DVR & love it that I can now record 4 channels at once. For those of you who not plan on HD hhokup the Standard definition is good.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Adri
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV mainly because it was cheap and was Samsung. Did not have great expectations about it but it turned out to be a great TV, way better than my very expensive Sony 40" TV with 1080p and 120Hz.Pros:- Image looks very well.- Reads lots of video formats from my hard disc.(unlike my expensive Sony)- The sound is very good.- I like the tuner for DTV channels.Cons:- I discovered this TV too late. :)

Reviews.Title: Nothing to complain about
Reviews.Author: K. Quick "BluesBrothers"
Reviews.Content: Bought this television for $278 and am very happy I did.  The picture is great for an lcd and the adjustments are easy.  The sound, while good, seems to project downward; which, is good when I'm sitting on the rug.  And the TV looks good when not on.  Having an HDMI on the side is nice as well.  We'll see if the set stands the test of time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: This TV is great, and I knew it would be.  Wal-Mart had advertised it for the same price weeks ago, but they would never sell it to me at the advertised price.  I had seen it on the wall of their stores, though, and it looked better than any of the other TVs, even larger ones.  This TV is really bigger than I would have chosen if it hadn't been such a good TV, especially for the price.The assembly was not more difficult than putting 8 screws in would be on any project.  The drawings and instructions showed how to do it, and there wasn't really another way that would have worked.  The sound and picture are really good.  I look forward to watching subtitled movies and being able to read the baseball scores.The TV was lightweight enough for me to set up without help, and I'm petite.

Reviews.Title: A good TV
Reviews.Author: H. McNeill
Reviews.Content: this is an excellent TV at a very good price. I bought one for our bedroom and it is just right for our 10X15 foot sized room. I bought it because we were very pleased with a 47" Samsung we recently purchased for our family room. I don't see any major difference in this 720ip picture and the larger 47" at 1080ip. Not every program is broadcast at 1080ip.The TV has enough adjustments to fine tune your picture to your conditions and preferences. The big complaint about the stand being difficult to install is easily resolved by using a Philips head screwdriver with a big enough handle to put some muscle into tightening the screws. They are a little hard to tighten but once tightened they are as solid as a rock, the stand does not swivel but at less than 20 pounds turning the TV is no big deal.I bought it from Amazon vendor Electronic Express and the product arrived on the promised date with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: lad
Reviews.Content: I like the picture on this tv.  The sound leaves a lot to be desired.  I fiddled with it a lot and it sounds better, still a little hollow.  The music does not sound good.  I guess it does not bother me much, this is just a bedrooom tv.  The sound is better than my other 42 inch tv, I was mad at that.  At 42 inches, it better sound good, it costs much.  I guess I mistakenly thought that if the picture looked good, the sound would be good also.  Live and learn.  I gave it 4 stars just for the sound.  The other features are good, remote is fine.

Reviews.Title: Does not play video files off USB drive!
Reviews.Author: T. Jensen
Reviews.Content: While this is a very nice little TV, the description of it here is inaccurate.  Contrary to what's written above, this TV will not play video files off a USB drive, it will only play music or show jpegs.  Very disappointing.  Samsung tells me that thus far, there is not firmware upgrade available to fix this.

Reviews.Title: Great for 32" 720p
Reviews.Author: General
Reviews.Content: Great TV!  Researched a lot about all the different 32" brands and it was down to a few: Sony, Samsung, Panasonic, and 1 or 2 more.  Ended up going to BestBuy to view actual image quality and Samsung won hands down. It was surprisingly  much better than others. Sony was 2nd.  Great settings. Easy set up. Easy hook ups: computer, gaming system, ect. Great remote. The USB function is awesome! I can tell a difference between 720 and 1080 however, so I'm selling it to get the better res 1080. Found a buyer the first time I mentioned I wanted to sell it! I'm not the only one who really likes it! Really is a great TV. I'll be sticking with Samsung, and just upgrading to the 5500 series for improved res at 1080p and faster refresh rate 120Hz. Buy this is you're ok with 720p. Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for any Bedroom!
Reviews.Author: MrsLPG
Reviews.Content: Great picutre.  The sound is good but if you have a noisy AC like I do, you would like to have more volume.  Good quality for the price, great brand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love this television. It has a great sharp picture and beautiful color. The size is perfect for our bedroom. I had a swivel stand that I placed it on since it does not come with one. I had no problem assembling the base of the tv at all. Samsung also was extremely helpful helping me set it up. It only took a few minutes and I was up and running. I have Dish network and a Samsung DVD recorder and wasn't sure how to set all of it up. That's why I called Samsung and they could not have been nicer!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for those who want basics
Reviews.Author: Courtney Salmon
Reviews.Content: Our used TV went out and we bought this one to replace it in our living room. We got rid of cable and have (unsucessfully) been using a converter box and an old TV. We didn't need anything fancy, though this TV has about every input you could ask for. It took about 15 minutes to set up and another 10 to do a channel scan for our antenna. Amazingly our channels now come in crystal clear! The picture and audio are both great and the remote is easy to use (though it's a bit long). You can easily customize your screen's picture and audio. Very happy to purchase this one!

Reviews.Title: Just the right size for my office TV
Reviews.Author: John Shannon "Illinois Traveler"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to setup,  I like it.  Couple this new HGTV with Comcast online channel changing and life is just dandy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Delivers Again
Reviews.Author: drw
Reviews.Content: Let me clarify that this is a 1080p and not a 720p.  Picture quality on HD channels is not quite as good as my Samsung 37" 720p, but for a small TV that is used in the bedroom this is very adequate at a very reasonable price.  My only criticism is that the base does not swivel like on the larger models.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LCD
Reviews.Author: KBarnes
Reviews.Content: Just received this product in the mail today and so far I'm very impressed!  Purchased for my beach house living room, which is pretty small, so this tv is the perfect size!  Seems as though it would be far too big for a bedroom, but I'm old fashioned and enjoy TV's that don't take up an entire room.  I did initially have an issue with the wobbly stand (as others had said).  I couldn't get the screws to tighten enough and the tv was leaning forward and easily moved in directions it shouldn't have.  After unscrewing the screws and screwing them back in with incredible force, they tightened just fine and the tv no longer wobbles to such an extreme degree.  Right out of the box the picture and sound are perfect.  Set up is easy and hook ups to dvd players, etc are just as easy!  This is an amazing tv at this price--you won't be disappointed.UPDATE 12/2/2011:  I have had this tv for less than 6 months and already 3 black lines have appeared on the right side of the screen.  These are definitely new, as they weren't there right out of the box.  I have looked up whether or not I can return the item, as this negatively affects the picture of the tv or any movies or games your playing.  I will have to look into the warranty (if it comes with one) to see if this item can be returned or exchanged for one that is not defective.  Pretty disappointed--it seems that Amazon should be responsible for defective electronics that haven't even been used for 6 months. Downgraded to one star.

Reviews.Title: Five star tv
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Great tv it was I little bit more expensive than some of the other brands but worth the extra cash.

Reviews.Title: Samsung - Great value
Reviews.Author: dkrieb "dkrieb"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Amazon about 2 weeks ago after researching options to replace our older 22 inch Sony in our bedroom. By far this TV was the best priced at the time from Amazon for the features offered. Picture is crisp and the sound is good at the 45 - 50 level which would be normal for a TV of this size. The market for 26 inch is small. I'd stay away from some of the off brands. Stay with Samsung, Panasonic, LG or as a last result Sony. Vizio was described as a disposable TV by a TV serviceman that I know.

Reviews.Title: The Samsung LN32D450 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Engelbert
Reviews.Content: The TV turned out exactly as advertised on Amazon and several other websites. Purchased this TV for my bedroom and it views perfectly. Also comes with many options for calibrating to my taste.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" - Assemby and Comparison
Reviews.Author: J. Butler
Reviews.Content: In reviewing reports and reviews of 32" LCD sets it came down to a short list of brands (LG, Sony, Panasonic, and Samsung). I currently have two LG flat screens of different sizes that work well but the picture was not the sharpest. In the store the Samsung appeared to have a sharper picture and the price was very competitive. In assembling the base to the TV the screws were very difficult to tighten. It appeared that the opening for the screws at the base was to small and the plastic was very hard, this prevented the screws from attaching to the base easily. If the base will not fully tighten to the TV, it will lean forward. The picture was slightly better than the LG but not outstanding. When the TV is turned on, there is no indication on the border to denote that the power is being supplied. The LG has a red to blue light that changes the power status. The program set up was fairly easy. For the price it is a good option.

Reviews.Title: easy to hang
Reviews.Author: Mark Hubelbank "hubel"
Reviews.Content: We use two of these displays for a trade show booth. The bright display is very eye catching, it was easy to setup and also importantly it is still light enough so one person can hang it on the wall.

Reviews.Title: I bought two
Reviews.Author: JoeCool
Reviews.Content: For the price, they are fantastic.  I've had both of mine for over a year and they still work terrific.  If you need something cheap for a kids room, or even your bedroom, these will do the trick!  They have great sound and easy to set up with cable or satellite.

Reviews.Title: I liked this TV
Reviews.Author: Anand
Reviews.Content: This TV is really very good.The only minor complaint i have is with its volume, which is not enough for movies.I bought external speaker to fill the gap.

Reviews.Title: Ok for bedroom
Reviews.Author: TronixSage
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for an elderly family member who wanted a TV in her bedroom. She isn't interested in HD cable, so the only programming this TV has seen is SD. The SD picture is pretty poor and text can be difficult to read. I did test this TV with my HD cable and the picture was about average compared to other TVs I've seen at BB & Wally-World.

Reviews.Title: Perfect simple tv
Reviews.Author: Natasha
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my 10 year old daughter, she loves it! It was extremely cheap and has, to my surprise, worked fantastically!! We have it connected to several gaming systems and use it as the screen for her pc. Have not had any issues with it and the picture quality is great for every input we have plugged into it. The sleep timer is great for late night movie watching, now I don't have to worry if she ramblers to turn it off before she falls asleep!! The picture in picture is fun too!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 22" HD TV
Reviews.Author: frubes "frubes"
Reviews.Content: Hooked up an amplified indoor HD antenna and this thing found over 100 stations in the LA area.  Good picture and sound, nice remote.  It made the PERFECT kitchen TV for Mom to watch while cooking, cleaning and eating at her place.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price and best style for a tv
Reviews.Author: whitewolfhatten
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv not knowing what is going to happen weather this is going to quite or what. Believe me I have this tv this long and man I love it and the best part its easy to use portable and what not. I am glad I got this tv

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent with some minor issues
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I ordered this online a few weeks ago after I was concerned about my old tv. I think it's pretty decent so far. The colors are an improvement over my old tv. There are some issues however I have noticed with it so far. The first is that there is a black bar that appears at the bottom of the screen (it only appears on on specific channel) that fades and reappears. It does not always happen, but it is somewhat bothersome. Another problem is some channels briefly lag (I don't know if this is due to my cable provider or it's actually my tv doing it). Other than that I think this is a decent purchase.

Reviews.Title: shotout82
Reviews.Author: shotout82
Reviews.Content: best television i've ever owned. will definitely will buy products again from samsung co. a satisfied customer. great prices too!

Reviews.Title: Great Quality!
Reviews.Author: themadwaxer
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  This was my first "large ticket" Amazon purchase and so far, I have NOT been disappointed!  The sound quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Professor G
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a month now, and I have been very happy with it.  You do need to play with the settings a bit, but once I did I've been very pleased with the colors and the sound. The manual is not very good, but I found the menu to be fairly intuitive.  Plus, while in the settings, there are captions for what many of the items do, so the manual is actually built in to the set.  I would recommend it, and am considering their larger model for another room.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: lonettemcm
Reviews.Content: Got this TV quickly and as described. It is the perfect size for my dorm room and the picture quality is amazing. I would refer it to anyone and everyone.

Reviews.Title: quick shipping
Reviews.Author: D. Chadwick
Reviews.Content: This was a much better price than they had in the stores, even better than Walmart. Good picture and audio quality

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Green Mountain Gal
Reviews.Content: Picture is crystal clear.  Product was very easy to assemble.  Perfect 1080p HDTV for our kitchen.  Glad to be able to see the screen in the kitchen again as our old television was not cutting it anymore.

Reviews.Title: major purchase
Reviews.Author: JimnJack
Reviews.Content: I am very contented with mysamsung 26 inch RTV.  It is every thing as advertised in Amazon's description and more.  The picture is the best I have ever seen on any previous set I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Sound
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy having this TV in our bedroom. The picture quality is great and the sound is super loud when we want it to be. My only complaint is that this TV is a huge dust magnet.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Emoney404
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV, clear picture, perfect size for bedrooms. USB plug into tv is also a great feature! HDMI from Xbox 360 to TV amazing picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Rob "drob"
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what we wanted for our bedroom. This thing is awesome and the perfect size for our room

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my application
Reviews.Author: dc
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture and perfectly fits the space in my RV.  There aren't a lot of 26 inch tv's out there...

Reviews.Title: Great Picture; easy setup
Reviews.Author: budha
Reviews.Content: Got this for the bedroom, and our heads are approx. 12' away from he TV.I think we should of gone up to a 37 or 42" model.Even though, its a very good picture and an easy setup. We are very happy with it and you can't beat the price ($298+free shipping)

Reviews.Title: 32" TV's don't NEED 1080p!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Yes, read the tittle.Unless your have hawk-eyes don't expect to see the difference between 1080i and 1080p on a 32" TV.(You may see difference on bigger TV's or higher resolution Monitors.[Depends on the person])------------------------------I have been using this TV for about 3 months now with no problems.Color, Image, Sound, and Adjustments are good enough for anyone interested in a 32" TV.It has two HDMI ports; one is located on the back and the other is located on the right-side of the TV frame.I find both to be in a convenient locations. I use the the side mounted HDMI port to plug n' play with my computer.You can expect to connect 2 HDMI, 2 Component, 1 VGA, 1 USB all at once.If you need more then get a home theater receiver or simple video splitter.All in all, this TV is great and offers enough of what you need in a 32" TV.

Reviews.Title: great  price great TV
Reviews.Author: rich
Reviews.Content: so far this TV has been great! picture perfect! sound isn't really as bad as people say for a thin machine. overall really happy

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450 32-Inch
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV we have purchased.  Both have performed very well, picture is excellent.  I would recommend Samsung and this model in particular, to others.

Reviews.Title: The best brand, the best sound
Reviews.Author: W. Corum "AaMCo"
Reviews.Content: As a long time buyer of Samsung, this was my second tv purchase. For how small this tv is the sound is amazing, and the picture quality rocks. The LCD has little to no glare problem even when covered in sunlight, and the amount of options you get with this set seem endless. It's hard to find a tv with so many USB, hdmi, pc, avi and cable hook ups all in one set. It's like the Swiss army knife of tvs!!The only thing I'd change is how it is attached to the stand. It's a bit frustrating to put together and when done incorrectly it can wobble. This tv is durable and has been moved around several times and not lost one pixel so it's still tough an deserves a perfect rating.

Reviews.Title: LCD TV
Reviews.Author: vejigirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv as a gift for my sister. When she put it together, the cord would not stay plugged in to the back of the tv. After fighting it for several days, I contacted Amazon. They immediately replaced the tv - I love Amazon !!!  Now she has the new tv and it is working great.  I would give the replacement tv a 5 star rating.  The picture on this tv is great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv until it broke
Reviews.Author: heartsfx
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in June from Best Buy. In January, I noticed two thin black lines on the left side of the TV. It is still watchable but I'm going to get it fixed. It is a great TV otherwise which is why I gave it 2 stars. I'll be returning it soon.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: J. Woodward
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this TV. I had an older 22" model by the same brand, and this is definitely an upgrade in every way--size, picture, sound, even aesthetic appeal. I am so very happy I did my research and found this baby.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450 32 inch LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: N. Rupp "Elcharis"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  For once the sound is pleasant and not jumping all over the place.  The picture quality is wonderful and I can adjust for several different sizes of the screen.  I mostly watch DVD's and do not have TV.  Vann's was the company I purchased from and the service was great.  I received it within three or four days and the set was packaged very well.  I had no problems putting it together or hooking it up.  I would definitely order from this company again it the occasion arose.

Reviews.Title: samaung 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: jamy
Reviews.Content: Works fine and has a nice picture.Enjoy it much I am using it in my bedroom. Haven't hooked up hi def yet.

Reviews.Title: Samaung LN22D450 22-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: Color is mediocre after trying hard to adjust it.  Sound is "tinny" probably because speakers are at the back. Didn't have any problem attaching base.  Using it in kitchen so it's almost OK.  Wouldn't recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: A Little pricey But worth it
Reviews.Author: leestir2001 "Leestir2001"
Reviews.Content: I have had the 26 inch for about a week and it is a little pricey for a tv this small but it does preformwell , picture quality is great and the sound is also good , we put this tv in our kitchen and its the perfect size for that area ,

Reviews.Title: 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: pduke
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived in good shape. I had no problem assembling the base, just follow directions. The picture is great.

Reviews.Title: nice samsung tv
Reviews.Author: David Normal
Reviews.Content: This is basically my first HDTV and I love it. I live in a small apartment and 32" is a good size. I think anything bigger would be overwhelming.I live alone and the sound is plenty loud. I put it up to 12 or 13 and I can hear it through out. I love the picture. The only problem was actually setting up the whole HD system.I had to implement it through the TV instructions and the cable company instructions.It would be nice to know what order to put everything in motion. I had to call my cable company and add HD service and add it to my bill, whick really is now getting out of hand.Beside that the delivery was swift and after ordering  it about 2:00am on a Friday, I received the TV on Monday about 2:00pm. So I got it the next business day without ordering next day service.I am very pleased and would recommend the TV and would recommend ordering it online, through Amazon,also.It sure beat having to drive around and using maybe $20 worth of gasoline, to look and buy the TV at a retail store.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: TBoza
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about this beauty.  Returned the vizio 32 inch 1080p razor led unit due to inconsistent color, flickering and overall disappointment.  This picture is much better, and it cost me 60 bucks less than the vizio did at costco.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Great Service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: LMV "Music Aficionado"
Reviews.Content: First, let me say that I purchased this TV based on the reviews posted here. The TV was easy to hook up except for the stand. The stand that came with the TV did not fit properly. I contacted Amazon and they offered two options: (1) I could order a new TV and just use the new stand or (2), I could call Samsung and have them send me a new stand. I chose the second option because the TV had already been hooked up and was already programmed. In hindsight, I should have chosen option 1. Samsumg was difficult to deal with as I had to send them the Amazon bill (which I did six times). I kept Amazon informed, and after sending the bill to Samsung for the third time, Amazon did an amazing thing - they sent me a new TV via Fedex so that I could take out the new stand and attach it to the TV. They even paid for return shipping. So that's what I did. Thank you! Amazon!As for the TV itself, I did not find the sound to be tinny in any way. The picture is fabulous, and navigating my way around the different programs was easy. I am loving this - my first flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: Cannot watch video files from USB... only music and photo
Reviews.Author: Drebeesie
Reviews.Content: I was rather disappointed when I plugged this TV in and hooked up a USB drive and attempted to watch an AVI file i had downloaded from online. The connect share on this TV seems to only pick up on audio and picture files! Huge disappointment! I ordered it with the full intention of putting it in my kids play room where in could simply download a file and place it on a USB drive for quick enjoyment. I googles sanding connectshare and it said it could do video music and pictures. Not so much on this unit. also after much tweaking the TV image is still not as crisp as it should be considering I am using a blue ray to test out the quality of the screen? The price is okay... Just don't expect anything fancy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo Rahausen "Grahausen"
Reviews.Content: I purchase the Samsung 32" TV, a few months ago. So far I haven't have any problems. It is very sharp and the colors a vibrant. I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, free and fast shipping, you can't beat this deal!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Perfect.  TV is great. My second Samsung HDTV.  Compared to others selling locally in the same price range, I went with this one because it had 20 watt speakers (vs. 10 watts).  Received in 2-3 days with free shipping option.  It doesn't get any better!

Reviews.Title: A good TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for the bedroom.  This is the third Samsung TV that we have purchased with no major issues, so I guess we are brand loyal. A good TV for a good price - that about sums it up.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: 24bing48 "24bing48"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung TV for my bedroom. I watch it late at night and when I am getting ready for work. It is a wonderful picture. I did not need to adjust it. The picture was perfect for me right out of the box. The other day I was standing to the side of the TV, at about 60 Degree angle from straight on, and noticed the faces to be a little washed out but as I moved to view it from straight on that disapppeared and was a good picture. I am very pleased with my purchase and will probably buy another Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: samsung ln32d450
Reviews.Author: caroline muller
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE NEW TV. AND PLUG AND PLAY.Thank you for your good service and I will recommend Amazon to one and all.

Reviews.Title: Replacing its predecessor in fine form
Reviews.Author: B. Campbell "argomd"
Reviews.Content: Extraordinary depth of color, close to 3-dimensionality for this 2-D device.  Since this replaces the equivalent model from 3 years ago, which had a small power issue that became fatal over its last year, I could immediately see the improvements.  It is a relief to finally have a brand with high quality and good value for the money -- it saves time and angst.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Zenabi
Reviews.Content: Why are people having so much trouble attaching the base???  It took me like 5 minutes!  Anyway, compared to other tvs in the store, this tv had the best picture hands down.  Very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: reconditioned but seems new
Reviews.Author: burl
Reviews.Content: this is much better than the westinghouse i just returned. good color, smart menu.well, there is one stupid thing. it appears you can program the  tv to turn different channels on and off at different times. i thought this could be used as an alarm, just like my rca. but it doesnt work that way. instead, it just changes the channel if the tv is already on. pretty stupid.this does not have all the features of the top end samsungs. i guess you have to pay lots more it you want to wake up to the morning news. stupid.the remoter is great. much bigger than others i seen. but the menu on screen is hard to read. you wont be able to read across the room if you are 15' away.for the money, i give this a 5. but because they were too cheap to give you the alarm, i made it 4.

Reviews.Title: Monitor
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: We already had one of this model that we were using as the living room TV.  I ordered this one because the eye doctor said the small monitors were straining my eyes.  It was easy to hook up as a monitor and works great for video, but the resolution is too low for its size, so letters on documents look fuzzy compared to a modern computer monitor.Using regular shipping, it showed up two days after I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: Claudia Krage
Reviews.Content: Love my new Samsung TV.  It arrived on time and in great shape.  Love Amazon Prime! Would recommend to anyone considering a TV purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: K-reader
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 24 inch Samsung in my bedroom.  I am thrilled with the TV.  I had no problems attaching the stand.  The only set up was adjusting the source to my satellite.  I didn't have to reprogram the remote, because I had a Samsung previously.  The sound quality is far superior to the 24".  The picture is sublime.  It is an attractive TV.  This TV is an excellent value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, good sound, easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: Barbara W.
Reviews.Content: Just received my new 32 inch Samsung "D450" LCD television.  Stand attached easily - but be sure to look at pieces and notice which area is marked "front".  Love the bright, clear picture and I think the sound is fine.  I went to two different "Big Box" stores, and this model was recommended at each store- however, the price was lower on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: TV is very good for the price. Easy to setup right out of the box. Would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: This is a great TV!
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: Although I heard some folks knock the off-angle viewing and the audio in this set, for my purposes those are great.  I am using it in a bathroom, so surround sound isn't a big deal to me.  The normal stereo is fantastic - and quite loud.  And in my 10x14 bathroom, I can see the screen clearly at any angle (except directly under it of course); even when the sunshine is coming through the big window in the morning.  So far, I haven't found anything I don't like.  I would recommend anyone look at this seriously.

Reviews.Title: Firmware issues, sleep timer breaks the TV
Reviews.Author: izabela
Reviews.Content: This TV gave me problems from the very beginning. The picture and audio quality is OK, I've seen better on other brands. The picture quality is REALLY BAD on the non-HD channels. The problem that really got me to return this is a sleep timer issue. Every time I use the sleep timer, the TV turns itself off the next time you want to turn the TV on. It takes a couple of hours before you can use the TV again. It's really annoying, you turn on the TV, you can see the picture and hear audio but 1 second later the picture turns itself off but the audio is still there. Really makes the TV unusable, unless you know you'll be watching the TV in a couple of hours and you turn it on to have it correct itself. This disappearing picture issue only happens after using the sleep timer. Samsung tech support had me reset the TV and said that it will fix it, it did not. All in all, I'd go with something else since there are much better TV's out there for WAY less. This is was my first Samsung, and my last.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: SRT
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture, slim design.Like most new models, the speakers don't work as well (not as loud and clear) as the older TV's (as their designed to have an added on sound bar).Added information 11-9-13:The TV picture died today, nothing but a black screen after only TWO YEARS!. Doing some research, I found this s a common problem on this unit at the 2 year mark...  Contacted Samsung, who offered to pay for the part, I had to pay for labor, deliver and pickup 40 miles away ($80.00 in fuel back and forth 4 times).  Labor is said to be about $250.00.I will NEVER PURCHASE another Samsung item as they obviously make an inferior product AND WILL NOT stand behind their products...

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Make sure to use HD Cablebox
Reviews.Author: Cturnish
Reviews.Content: My first hd tv. easy to setup, great picture. i have read other people complain about the sound. I had sound problems when I first set it up BUT it was because I was using a regular cable box instead of the hd cable box. After connecting the HD cable box . The sound and picture were awesome.  the order arrived in good condition and in a timely manner (unlike this review).  I have no complaints.I will definitely buy another.

Reviews.Title: A good TV.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Carone
Reviews.Content: We got this TV when our last one quit.  It has a good picture and sound and fits perfectly in our entertainment cemter.  The price is good too.]]]]

Reviews.Title: Decent picture, mediocre sound
Reviews.Author: NM
Reviews.Content: We needed a decent TV to replace our CRT in the bedroom. We have 2 purchased 2 other Samsung TVs and love them so we wanted to stick with Samsung. This TV is a decent little set, decent picture, great build quality which you find in all Samsung TVs but sound like many others have stated is just ok. It makes a great TV for the bedroom but if I had to watch it for hours at a time I would get something with better sound. This is my only 60hz TV and you can tell a difference for sure. I would definitley go for a 120hz TV if I had to do it all over again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: buckeye9
Reviews.Content: Purchased this LCD TV 60 days ago.  After 60 days no picture, only sound.  Repair shop told me the TCON board failed and needs to be replaced.  TV did not have over 100 hours of viewing time on it.  You would think something like this would last more than 100 hours but I guess that is expecting too much for items manufactured overseas.  Will not buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture. Not Samsung Quality.
Reviews.Author: Jason D
Reviews.Content: I've had a Samsung 46" TV for 3 years and been extremely happy with it so I didn't hesitate to go with them again when I needed a small TV in the kitchen. Even though the title says 720p, I knew this model was a 1080p. It says so on Samsung's website, on Best Buy's website, and most importantly on the box and TV itself. However it doesn't perform like a 1080p. The picture is terrible compared to my 46". That goes for both regular channels and HD channels. Shouldn't it at least appear to be better since it's so much smaller? I have two more TV's to buy in the near future and Samsung is definitely off my list of choices.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450  - Quality somewhat below expected
Reviews.Author: Deal Pilgrim
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN32D450 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)I did my normally careful research on 32" 720p HDTV and after comparisons with Vizio, I selected this Samsung for our bedroom. Since we already have a 52" Sony 1060p, I was expecting the clarity to be somewhat reduced although the viewing/distance factor (about 5-6') would suggest no noticable difference with a 720p. The difference is noticeable but not objectionable. I'm also not certain that I have adjusted everything as well as possible either. THe TV arrived in great shape, and quickly via Amazon Prime. Overall, I think this is a good choice for a 2nd HDTV and occasional use in BR setting. I would recommend it to others as well.

Reviews.Title: 32-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Martha B. Carraway
Reviews.Content: The TV is great. Fits nicely in the space allocated for it. My husband enjoys it. I was able to track it the whole time and knew the day it would arrive. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: SecurityRich
Reviews.Author: SecurityRich
Reviews.Content: This is my third Samsung LCD TV.  I have a 46" in my family room and a 17" in my kitchen.  This one, as does the others, has a great picture on HD stations and the sound & volume is the best of them all.  I am very please with this TV.  I may have to buy another for my workshop.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Sharon Charters "sharon3711"
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for my 92 year old mother.  She absolutely loves it. It's the perfect size for her apartment and the picture is beautiful.The price was reasonable and for someone who has only basic cable and no internet access this television is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: kafacan
Reviews.Content: Not a professional to review the electronic background of the TV however I love the USB function. It works perfectly with any USB drive.The tv is easy to set up. The price is reasonable cheap compared to other products in the market. It was my first Samsung I don't think it will be last..

Reviews.Title: buzzing noise
Reviews.Author: Monica Iluyomade
Reviews.Content: Whenever I used this TV a clearly audible noise soon became apparent after an hour or so. None of the other reviews seemed to have mentioned this. I guess my ears are sensitive.

Reviews.Title: Buy this TV from Amazon.
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM B. HIRST III
Reviews.Content: My wife plugged in the iron while the Edenpure heater was on; the lights went out. I need a TV that uses low wattage. I tried to buy two differant used 32 inch TVs; nothing happened after 5 days. Bought this TV on Amazon Friday AM, it came Monday PM. Uses 85 watts. Perfect size for small living room in 100 year old house. Great picture and sound, especially with our DVDs.I bought this from Amazon, paid standard shipping, came quickly from Phoenix (I'm in San Diego.)

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: E. Rivera "Lizzy quilts"
Reviews.Content: It has a wonderful image, clean and crisp.  I am really a Samsung fan.  It was easily installed.  It had all the pieces I needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Leej30
Reviews.Content: This is nice tv. good price and good quality. It has a 3-hdmi input. However, the stant is fixed,it doesn't move left or right side. It also support only 110v.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: Rich "rapsf"
Reviews.Content: We had a struggle with initial setup because the stand's mount will not screw all the way down, even with power tools, so the TV is wobbly and tilts forward on the pedestal.  The TV constantly turns itself on, and occasionally off during viewing, with no input from the remote.  This is caused by a known problem with the capacitors in the internal power board, well documented by complaints on the web.  It requires a soldering job to replace the capacitors.  The box says two HDMI inputs, but there is only of one of the miniature, small plug type; the other is a set of component type inputs (5 wires).  Nowhere on the packaging is 720p specified as in the Amazon specs, but during setup the screen says 1080p is used for a connected blu ray player, making us wonder if we are getting full definition.  We plan to return this to the store where we bought it and get a brand without these issues.  Otherwise, we expect the capacitor issue to cause the set to fail completely sooner or later, probably when it is just out of warranty.

Reviews.Title: It took Samsung 5 WEEKS to replace my faulty TV
Reviews.Author: Erika Young
Reviews.Content: Five months after I bought the TV, black vertical lines appeared on the screen. I had to take the TV to a local repair shop that fixes Samsung TVs under warranty.After 2 weeks the shop called to say they cannot get the part, because it's on back order. Samsung Rep then called and offered me a new TV, BUT it took 3 more weeks until a trucking company brought it to me. So all together I was left 5 WEEKS without a TV!!!I was always under the impression that Samsung TVs are made better than this, and that their service will be better than this, but I obviously changed my mind. Will not buy their products again!

Reviews.Title: Lousy with Comcast, great without it
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace an old one I had in my garage where I workout in the mornings.  I usually watch either the local news or Comcast Sportsnet Bay Area.  I have only the basic cable service to the garage (HD in the house).  If I plug the incoming cable line directly into the TV I get around 80 channels and maybe half of them are HD.  The HD is great.  The non HD channels are so-so.  The channel numbers are completely different than what I am use to.  Examples:  4-1, 4-2, 89-1, 89-2, 89-3, etc.  I still get my local news (in both HD and regular) but I do not get the Comcast Sportsnet Bay Area station.  When I run the incoming cable through the Comcast box I am back to my 30 channels or so, none of them HD.  However the images are slightly off (almost to the point of appearing animated).  It looks like the TV is receiving most of the image and then is filling in the blanks.  Any  movements on the screen create a blur for a split second while it tries to catch up.  Is it possibe Comcast intentionally downgrades the performance of basic cable in order to sell more HD boxes?  Bottom line - I can get great HD reception with odd channel numbers but no Sportsnet or I can get mediocre to poor reception but get the Sportsnet channel.  That's crappy.

Reviews.Title: Good product.. but it could have been better!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Good product.. but it could have been better! There is no audio port (you cannot connect headphones), and that really sucks!

Reviews.Title: Great little television
Reviews.Author: L. Mould
Reviews.Content: I already have a samsung ln52b630, and several other family members have Samsung Tv's as well. So when my parents wanted a small flat screen for the kitchen, I just punched up Samsung and away I went. Ordered 1 day, it arrived the next! Since I'm setup was a breeze, and the picture is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: V. Watson "tv watcher"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift.  My daughter says it was easy set up and the picture is so pretty it doesn't look real.  I have Samsung TV's and have nothing but praise for this manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Great Delivery from Vendor!
Reviews.Author: DLB
Reviews.Content: This was ordered because of recommendations of previous buyers and from buyers guides on the Internet.  It was easy to hook up, easy to use and excellent quality!  I have had excellent results with Samsung products.DLB

Reviews.Title: Do not buy any Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Jay A. Henderson
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung 52 inch TV in Jan 2010 and the backlights are shot.  Samsung will not cover any repair that is out of warranty.  This is a 1200 dollar repair for a 2000 dollar TV. DO NOT BUY

Reviews.Title: Don't count on the alarm
Reviews.Author: gwm "gwm"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these T.V.'s a few days ago.  Both have excellent and very sharp pictures.  We purchased one of these for the master bdrm. and one for the bdrm. in our condo a hundred miles from home.  Both were purchased because they have built in alarms, not one, not two but three alarms.  Guess what?  None of the alarms work, both of our places has HDTV and apparently the alarms only work on old standard def signals.  Now isn't that something, we live in a H.D. world and the alarm only works with standard def.  If you don't have a need for an alarm, this is an excellent T.V.  Delivery was very fast via Fed. Ex. and both T.V.'s worked right out of the box as advertised except for the alarms.  Hopefully Samsung will figure this one out.  There are a lot of complaints about this issue on web forums.  I wish I had checked these out before I ordered.  If Samsung answers my questions as soon as they have questions about my cell phone then I will be waiting a long time.  My first question to them was in December of 2010 for a cell phone question, I am still waiting and it is now June 21, 2011.  Today I sent them an e-mail regarding the alarm issue.

Reviews.Title: Died in one day...
Reviews.Author: Timothy Lin
Reviews.Content: This TV had a few problems from the very beginning, and I only owned it for one day! To begin with, like others have mentioned, the base stand was defective. The screws would simply not go all the way in, and I put quite a bit of muscle into it. This left the TV tilting forward which worried me. Secondly, there were intermittent popping noises that would come from the TV, which at the time, together with the base stand issue, I was willing to overlook for the $349 I paid. However, by the end of my first day with the TV, the Samsung logo randomly appeared on the screen while I was watching TV, the TV shut off, and never turned back on. The 2-star courtesy rating is based on the fact that picture quality was quite good while it lasted. But that's not saying much.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Dave B
Reviews.Content: We owned this tv for 2-3 years used once or twice a month in a spare room.Long story short,tv would not turn on,found out the capacitors are bad,Samsung was aware of the problem and will replace for free under or out of warranty but you have to ship the set to NJ to have repaired and if anything else is wrong will charge you $100 to repair plus shipping.At $300 can't say this was a real good "bang for the buck" purchase and will stay away from Samsung in the future.

Reviews.Title: Decieving
Reviews.Author: Guy
Reviews.Content: The title of this tv says that it is 120Hz, but under technical details it says that it is 60Hz.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Ms. Radmila M. Meyer "new book"
Reviews.Content: I like Samsung TV. Samsung is making TV's smarter, with its Samsung Apps line of televisions and Blu-ray devices, which can download, install, and run apps natively.  Samsung Apps is built into all Samsung 2010 Blu-ray players, Blu-ray Home Theater Systems, and the majority of TVs 40 inches and larger.  For the first time, distributing content to TVs is as easy as creating an app!

Reviews.Title: decent tv, a little outdated
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This tv is very nice, but it is a little outdated, led is now the standard pretty much, its smaller usually and uses less power, can't really match that with lcd

Reviews.Title: Poor Photo Quality Purchased from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Robert Abidor "Arizona Bob"
Reviews.Content: I must disagree with the prior reviewer.  I find the picture quality to be terrible.  There is a lot of ghosting a fading.  Colors drain and blend.  Frankly, even for $319 the D450 is a piece of junk.  I will probablykeep it for a little while and then dump it.  I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Avoid it
Reviews.Author: John Wright
Reviews.Content: The base is impossible to assemble correctly.  I got it together but now tv will not swivel as it should.  But the biggest problem is the sound.  Just after the warranty ran out, the sound went crazy--real tinny and with an echo.  My plan is to throw this thing out and get a Sony of Panasonic.  And I will avoid Samsung for the rest of my life.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32D450 720P
Reviews.Author: William Toth Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung HDTV model LN32D450 from BestBuy last week. Since we drove 30 miles to Dickson City so we asked that they test the TV so that there would be no problems. Some worker brought it in the back room and came back 10 minutes later with a BestBuy quality control tape replacing the manufacturers tape. One hour and 30 miles later we unwrapped the TV at home. You guessed it!...DOA!!!!We brought it back and BestBuy confirmed the Dead On Arrival issue. They gave us another. OK. We bring this one home and it least this one turns on. A little background info. We are NOT using a High Definition box but expect it to perform somewhat as well as our Sony KDL-46EX400 does with the same box. The first thing that strikes me is that the picture is a bit jerky at times (jitters?) and has what appears to be a very slight AGC? overload problem on certain bright scenes. During those scenes, each color which make up facial tones does not blend into the next facial tone. It has a very noticeable demarcation in the color shift like those stock brokerage commercials where they intentionally do this effect to get your attention.(but far more subdued) I tried adjusting every user control possible but cannot eliminate the problem. It MAY work fine with an HDTV box but I do not have one available to test my theory.Quality control issues at the Samsung factory need to be resolved. Maybe I'll go with Amazon and purchase another Sony.

Reviews.Title: me gusta
Reviews.Author: julio manuel roa.
Reviews.Content: son buenos vendedores los recomiendo a todas aquellas personas que se atrevan y realicen sus comprasgracias y muy agradecidosoludos

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Brad Schonhorst
Reviews.Content: We purchased a similar model (40 inch) in 2008 and loved it but about a month after the warranty ran out the speakers started sounding fuzzy.  A few months later we could no longer use the speakers and had to hook it up to some external speakers.  We ended up getting the speakers replaced thinking it was a small price to pay for such a nice picture.  Six months later the vertical lines started to surface.  Thin lines running from top to bottom - mostly black but some blue and green as well.  Gradually over the last 2 years, more and more vertical lines have appeared and there is a 4 inch strip down the left side that flickers between different colors.Do your research before buying any Samsung TV's.  There are many complaints about the quality of their LCD TV's and when we call they act as if they have never heard of this issue before.  I will never buy another product of theirs again.
